string _nam,\r string _registrationFee,\r string _premium,\r string _target,\r uint256 _reemittancePeriod\r ) public {\r chamaCount++;\r chamaManager1 = msg.sender;\r uint256 time = block.timestamp;\r address[] memory membs;\r // 4896000 is Epoch Unix time equivalence of a year\r chamas[chamaCount] = ChamaDetails(\r chamaCount,\r _nam,\r chamaManager1,\r _registrationFee,\r _premium,\r _target,\r time,\r _reemittancePeriod,\r membs,\r 4896000\r );\r //return(chamaCount);\r } "},"disburseDividends(uint256,address)":{"notice":"function listOfChamaDetails(uint256 _chamsID) public view returns(ChamaDetails[]) {\r // expect to return the members addresses made with the loan requests details\r return (chamas[_chamsID]);\r } createRandomChama(string,uint256,uint256.notice: constructor( string _nam, string _registrationFee, string _premium, string _target, uint256 _reemittancePeriod ) public { chamaCount++; chamaManager1 = msg.sender; uint256 time = block.timestamp; address[] memory membs; // 4896000 is Epoch Unix time equivalence of a year chamas[chamaCount] = ChamaDetails( chamaCount, _nam, chamaManager1, _registrationFee, _premium, _target, time, _reemittancePeriod, membs, 4896000 ); //return(chamaCount); }

disburseDividends(uint256,address).notice: function listOfChamaDetails(uint256 _chamsID) public view returns(ChamaDetails[]) { // expect to return the members addresses made with the loan requests details return (chamas[_chamsID]); }
